title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations          Canal Discoveries (Cell Phone Tour): Your personal, portable ranger awaits! Listen to canal stories from your computer or cell phone. Click here to get started.             Locking Through (Video)   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 4 seconds  Watch a canal boat use a lift lock in this short, captioned video. Animations help illustrate how these simple engineering structures conquered the terrain of Western Maryland.          TRANSCRIPT: Locking Through video transcript (82 KB PDF)           Mule Power (Video)   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:4 minutes, 44 seconds  Mules are amazing hybrids! Watch this captioned video to learn about what made mules the ideal choice for canal boat operations, and see how National Park Service rangers train and care for the mules today.          TRANSCRIPT: Mule Power video transcript (91 KB PDF)                      C&O Canal Tour (Video) This non-narrated video takes viewers on a trip down the canal from Cumberland, Maryland, to Georgetown. See aqueducts, lift locks, the Paw Paw Tunnel, the Great Falls of the Potomac, birds, turtles, wildflowers, and more amazing resources waiting to be discovered on your 184.5 mile long journey.  Duration:5 minutes, 8 seconds
